exclusion:
There are two exclusion methods:

1. Exclusion from the primary controller / gateway:

Twice press the reset button, the dimmer will be set to exclusion mode, waiting to be excluded.

2. Factory reset the dimmer (forcing it to be excluded from a network):

Press and hold down the reset button for over 4 seconds, the dimmer will be reset to factory defaults after the BLUE LED indicator blinks.
inclusion: Make sure the right switch is set to Z-Wave. Power on the dimmer, press and hold the reset button for over 4 seconds.
label: EcoDim07
overview: Remotely controlled multi level push / turn dimmer that can be controlled through Z-Wave and Zigbee (by setting a hardware switch). The dimmer is suitable for 0-200W LED lights where the MIN and MAX values can be set with hardware dials. The dimmer can be installed in a 2 wire setup (no N-wire required) and has a soft start system.
usage:
To make the dimmer work optimally you can adjust the lamps optimally to the dimmer with the MIN MAX adjustment.

Set MIN

Switch on the lights with the push / turn button. When the lights are on, put a screwdriver in the MIN and turn to the left. When the light becomes unstable turn a little further to the right so that the light remains stable.

Set MAX

Switch on the lights with the push / turn button. When the lights are on put a screwdriver in the MAX and turn to the right. When the light becomes unstable turn a little further to the left so that the light remains stable.

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: State after power restored
parameters.overview: State after power restored. The state the switch should return to once power is restored after power failure.

options.label: Return to state after power outage

parameters.label: Notify load status change
parameters.description: Send notification to associated device when status is changed.
parameters.overview: Notification when load status changes. The dimmer will send notification to associated device (group lifeline) when the status of the dimmer load is changed.

options.label: When load status has not changed
